name: Arcane_Tools
description: Arcane Tools is a comprehensive suite designed to enhance the trading experience for both novice and experienced day traders. With a focus on efficiency and user-friendliness, this toolset aims to streamline your trading process and provide a competitive edge.

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=false forceUpdate=false electron-packager . Arcane_Tools --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=build --overwrite --prune=true --ignore="^/dist$"
scripts.package: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=false forceUpdate=false electron-packager . Arcane_Tools --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=dist --overwrite
scripts.package-all: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=false forceUpdate=false electron-packager . Arcane_Tools --all --out=dist --overwrite
scripts.package-mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=false forceUpdate=false electron-packager . Arcane_Tools --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --out=dist --overwrite
scripts.package-linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=false forceUpdate=false electron-packager . Arcane_Tools --platform=linux --arch=x64 --out=dist --overwrite
scripts.publish: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=false forceUpdate=false electron-builder -p always

author: Morgan A Ray
